entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Deline
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.1°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
